messages.subject: Re: Manual Transmission Mazda 3 Inquiry
messages.body:
Hi Ashley,

Thank you for reaching out! While we don't currently have any manual transmission Mazda 3 models in stock, I recommend checking out the [2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Sport](https://www.missionviejokia.com/used-inventory/?make=Mazda&model=MX-5 Miata). It's a fantastic choice if you're looking for a fun driving experience, and it offers a sporty manual transmission option!

As for a more budget-friendly option, I’d be happy to help you explore our inventory to find something that fits your needs. Omar Jasso can assist you with any specific preferences or price ranges you have in mind. 

Would you like to schedule a time to visit and check out our selection? You can also reserve your time instantly here: Schedule Your Visit.

Please let us know a convenient time for you, or you can instantly reserve your time here: <{LegacySalesApptSchLink}>


Patti
Tustin Mazda
28 Auto Center Dr, Tustin, CA 92782

customerFirstMsgDict.customerMsg: Hi there, do you have any manual transmission mazda 3? Manual right? You got anything a little bit cheaper?
customerFirstMsgDict.notes: The customer is inquiring about manual transmission Mazda 3 options and asking for cheaper alternatives.

body_html:
Hi Ashley,

Thank you for reaching out! While we don't currently have any manual transmission Mazda 3 models in stock, I recommend checking out the [2024 Mazda MX-5 Miata Sport](https://www.missionviejokia.com/used-inventory/?make=Mazda&model=MX-5 Miata). It's a fantastic choice if you're looking for a fun driving experience, and it offers a sporty manual transmission option!

As for a more budget-friendly option, I’d be happy to help you explore our inventory to find something that fits your needs. Omar Jasso can assist you with any specific preferences or price ranges you have in mind. 

Would you like to schedule a time to visit and check out our selection? You can also reserve your time instantly here: Schedule Your Visit.

Please let us know a convenient time for you, or you can instantly reserve your time here: <{LegacySalesApptSchLink}>


Patti
Tustin Mazda
28 Auto Center Dr, Tustin, CA 92782
